answers.answer: Hi,How are you?Burning sensation in the body can be due to peripheral neuropathy due to diabetes or B12 deficiency. Other causes can be fibromyalgia, and multiple sclerosis. It can also be a symptom of acute anxiety or sleep deprivation.Please get yourself evaluated by your physician. Take care!

title: burning pain from the back of waist down to the knee
